title: Leather shield

properties.name: description
properties.value: Leather shields are a class of shields that are oriented toward rangers. They can be made by using various types of wooden shields with certain types of leather, while adding metal nails to complete the shield. Players can speak to the shield master in the Ranging Guild to receive a leather shields flyer, which details the materials needed to create each leather shield.

content:
Leather shields are a class of shields that are oriented toward rangers. They can be made by using various types of wooden shields with certain types of leather, while adding metal nails to complete the shield. Players can speak to the shield master in the Ranging Guild to receive a leather shields flyer, which details the materials needed to create each leather shield.

As they are made solely for rangers, these shields confer high penalties for players attacking with melee or magic whilst having these shields equipped, while giving moderate resistance to magic attacks and a fairly low resistance for melee and ranged attacks.

Snakeskin shield-15-15-11-103109871000%008.0

Red d'hide shield-15-15-11-106181614131300%008.0
Black d'hide shield-15-15-11-107211816151400%008.0

Leather shield Skills Wooden Shield + 2 Leather + 15 Nails

Snakeskin 56 42 Willow Snake Iron
Green d'hide 62 57 Maple Green dragon Steel
Blue d'hide 69 72 Yew Blue dragon Mithril
Red d'hide 76 87 Magic Red dragon Adamant
Black d'hide 83 92 Redwood Black dragon Rune

'''Leather shields''' are a class of [[shield]]s that are oriented toward [[Ranged|rangers]]. They can be made by using various types of wooden shields with certain types of leather, while adding metal nails to complete the shield. Players can speak to the [[shield master]] in the [[Ranging Guild]] to receive a [[leather shields flyer]], which details the materials needed to create each leather shield.

As they are made solely for rangers, these shields confer high penalties for players attacking with melee or magic whilst having these shields equipped, while giving moderate resistance to magic attacks and a fairly low resistance for melee and ranged attacks.

==Bonuses==
{{Infotable Bonuses|Hard leather shield|Snakeskin shield|Green d'hide shield|Blue d'hide shield|Red d'hide shield|Black d'hide shield|sort=dslash|nototals=yes}}
